"A.P.242/1/10 11:00": "The black hole's rate of expansion is increasing. So even stopping time only delays the inevitable... That's just unfair."
"W-What do we do, Xiao? Maybe there's something else I could..."
"No, keep channeling. If that were to stop, its rate of expansion would go out of control."
"...Xiao. It's safe to say that it grows by consuming the surrounding Photons, right?"

"That's likely the case, yes, but...
What did you have in mind, Alma?"
"Matoi. You'll have to take care of the channeling by yourself, okay?"
"You'll be fine. Don't worry about making small adjustments; just put all of your strength into it."
"As for me, well... I'm going to go do something that only I can do."
"...Matoi! Focus on channeling! Alma knows what she's doing...!"
"But, if she's all by herself, what'll..."
"...I know. And I agree. I'm not about to let her do this alone."

"...<%me>.
Everyone's trying their best. They're doing everything they can."
"So I'm also going to try my hardest to protect you all... Good luck, everyone!"
